00023 #ifndef __NITF_MEMORY_IO_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_MEMORY_IO_HPP__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/NITFException.hpp"
00027 #include "nitf/System.hpp"
00028 #include "nitf/IOInterface.hpp"
00029 
00035 namespace nitf
00036 {
00037 
00042 class MemoryIO : public IOInterface
00043 {
00044 
00045 private:
00046     nitf::Off mCapacity;
00047     bool mOwn;
00048     char *mBuffer;
00049     nitf::Off mPosition;
00050 
00051 public:
00052 
00053     MemoryIO(nitf::Off capacity) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00054         : mCapacity(capacity), mOwn(true), mPosition(0)
00055     {
00056         mBuffer = new char[capacity];
00057         if (!mBuffer)
00058             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("Out of memory"));
00059     }
00060 
00061     MemoryIO(char *buffer, nitf::Off size, bool adopt = false) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00062             : mCapacity(size), mOwn(adopt), mBuffer(buffer), mPosition(0)
00063     {
00064     }
00065 
00066     ~MemoryIO()
00067     {
00068         if (mOwn && mBuffer)
00069             delete [] mBuffer;
00070     }
00071 
00072     virtual void read(char * buf, size_t size)
00073     {
00074         if ((mPosition + size) > mCapacity)
00075             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("Attempting to read past buffer boundary."));
00076         memcpy(buf, (char*)(mBuffer + mPosition), size);
00077         mPosition += size;
00078     }
00079 
00080     virtual void write(const char * buf, size_t size) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00081     {
00082         if ((mPosition + size) > mCapacity)
00083             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("Attempting to write past buffer boundary."));
00084         memcpy((char*)(mBuffer + mPosition), buf, size);
00085         mPosition += size;
00086     }
00087 
00088     virtual nitf::Off seek(nitf::Off offset, int whence) throw(nitf::NITFException)
00089     {
00090         switch (whence)
00091         {
00092         case NITF_SEEK_CUR:
00093             if (offset + mPosition > mCapacity)
00094                 throw nitf::NITFException(
00095                         Ctxt("Attempting to seek past buffer boundary."));
00096             mPosition += offset;
00097             break;
00098         case NITF_SEEK_END:
00099             throw nitf::NITFException(Ctxt("SEEK_END is unsupported with MemoryIO."));
00100         case NITF_SEEK_SET:
00101             if (offset > mCapacity)
00102                 throw nitf::NITFException(
00103                         Ctxt("Attempting to seek past buffer boundary."));
00104             mPosition = offset;
00105             break;
00106         }
00107         return mPosition;
00108     }
00109 
00110     virtual nitf::Off tell() throw(nitf::NITFException)
00111     {
00112         return mPosition;
00113     }
00114 
00115     virtual nitf::Off getSize() throw(nitf::NITFException)
00116     {
00117         return mCapacity;
00118     }
00119 
00120     virtual void close()
00121     {
00122         //do nothing
00123     }
00124 };
00125 
00126 }
00127 #endif
